name: Rewinding Tower
description:
Controlls

WASD to move

Click to attack

Space to pick up/Interact

Pitch

The tower is rewinding to a state where it was not even built yet, rooms desapears and the tower is crumbling!

Loot rooms before they collapse and buy upgrades to the shop (in green on the mini map) to be powerfull enought to escape the tower.

Team

Music and SFX : Hivernote

Coding : Gogani

Coding and Art : Caberu

(Made for the Brackey Game Jam 2020.2)
